title: Dolores The Tattoo Lady ornate blackletter
content:
hello all….  
wondering if people could shed some light on this font. i know alot of this stuff was calligraphy, but there must be some font made in this engraver’s/calligraphers style…  
many many thanks in advance to any help…..  
charles

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070404143133/http:/typophile.com/files/font_43.jpg) | 36.83 KB |
author: chibasan

comments.content:
[Gert Wiescher](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Gert%20Wiescher) loves this stuff: [Royal Bavarian](http://web.archive.org/web/20070404143133/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&displayfontid=CCW.119179.0.0&fontRendererText=Dolores), [Ayres Royal](http://web.archive.org/web/20070404143133/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/ayres-royal/?refby=typographica)

Your sample is essentially a blackletter, but his [Bodoni Classic Deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20070404143133/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=CCW.119869.0.0) has similar flourishes.
